full_summary:
================================

**Tender Announcement**
---------------------

**Title:** Appian Architect and Senior Analyst Services
-------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-738-49388294

**Solicitation Number:** ITS202403-001

**Publication Date:** 2024-03-21

**Closing Date:** 2024-04-05 (23:59:00)

**Description:** Telefilm Canada is seeking services from a senior Appian architect and analyst to support various projects. Key responsibilities include:

* Supporting the Principal system (Project Dialogue) for Telefilm Canada and the Canada Media Fund (CMF), including legal projects, project financing, and new program development
* Designing and implementing required features and functionalities in the system Dialogue
* Contributing to Diversity & Inclusion initiatives and integrating requirements into Dialogue
* Ensuring compliance with Telefilm Canada's objectives

**Scope and Requirements**
-------------------------

* Work with Telefilm Canada's IT team to design, develop, and implement new features and functionalities in the system Dialogue
* Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and objectives
* Provide technical guidance and support for system integration and testing

**Commercial Terms**
------------------

* Bidders are required to provide a detailed proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and technical capabilities
* A combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to evaluate bids
* Telefilm Canada will award the contract to the bidder offering the best value

**Eligibility and Contact Information**
--------------------------------------

This tender is open to all qualified bidders. The contact person for this opportunity is Yves Brousseau at (438) 469-1294 or <ofre.bid@telefilm.ca>. 

Attachments
-----------

The tender document and attached templates are available for download:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33893/telefilm_-_rfq_form_v4._it_appianarchitect_en.zip (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33893/telefilm_-_dp_form-it_appianarchitecte_fr_0.zip (French)

Evaluation Procedure
---------------------

A panel of evalurators will assess the received bids according to the evaluation criteria specified in the call to compete. Telefilm Canada will evaluate proposals based on:
1. The level of development in previous Experience with senior IT positions, strong documentation skills and logical thinking
2. Alignment with project objectives and scope of work
3. Long-term value to
